definition: a device for extracting water (such as a centrifuge)
to shed/to take off/to escape/to get away from
water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: Let the washing spin before you put it out to dry.
sentences.chinese: 先讓衣服在脫水機裏轉一轉，再拿出去晾乾。

sentences.english: The sludge dewatering performance of screw press dehydrator was investigated.
sentences.chinese: 考察了螺旋壓榨式脫水機對污泥的脫水性能。

sentences.english: The Rotory Press Filter is a new type of dewatering equipment.
sentences.chinese: 滾壓式污泥脫水機是一種新型脫水機械。

sentences.english: This equipment is consisted of belt thickener dewatering unit and belt press filter.
sentences.chinese: 該設備由帶式濃縮脫水機和帶式壓濾機組合而成。
